definitions.definition: Roughly - made , unsophisticated , decrepit (from the use of haywire for temporary repairs ).
Behaviorally erratic or uncontrollable , especially of a machine or mechanical process .
examples: It was working fine until it went haywire and wouldn't stop printing blank sheets.
Those kids go haywire when they don't get what they want.

main_definition: Roughly - made , unsophisticated , decrepit (from the use of haywire for temporary repairs ).
secondary_definitions: Behaviorally erratic or uncontrollable , especially of a machine or mechanical process .
